# Facility Maintenance Service Application

This is a web application that allows businesses to sign up for a facility maintenance service. The service provides QR code generation for restroom feedback surveys and collects patron responses to help maintenance teams keep facilities up to par.

## Project Structure
- Business signup and dashboard
- QR code generation for facility surveys  
- Patron feedback collection system
- Survey management and reporting

## Technologies
- Next.js for full-stack web application
- React for frontend components
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Prisma with SQLite for database
- QR code generation library
- Form handling and validation

## Features
1. Business Registration & Login
2. Facility Management Dashboard
3. QR Code Generation for Surveys
4. Patron Survey Interface
5. Feedback Collection & Reporting
6. Maintenance Issue Tracking

## Development Notes
- Focus on responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Ensure QR codes are easily scannable
- Simple, intuitive survey interface for patrons
- Comprehensive dashboard for business owners
